name: Flappy Plane (LujiiHC)
description:
The game Game created by me during the NoneClass course!

It's a FlappyBird-style game where you earn points as you survive obstacles and level up whenever you reach a certain amount of points! There are nine levels in total.

Credits

Sprites: Kenny 

Sound Effects: Isaac Malta 

Music: Kevin MacLeod

Game-Dev: LujiiHC
